Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 24th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/11/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1983, going 2-1, 0.81...
Injured on 6/16/1984 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 10/24/1984 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
